testcase.name: User is able to create a new contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login page.........................................passed When title of login page is FreeCRM.........................................passed Then user enters "naveenk" and "test@123"...................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed And user is on Home page....................................................passed Then user moves to new Contact page.........................................passed Then user enters contact details "Tom" and "Peter" and "QA".................passed And close the browser.......................................................passed
